items.title: Dell made a big-ass 52-inch 6K Thunderbolt display
items.summary: Stonks are going to look so good in 6K. | Image: Dell The world's first 52-inch 6K monitor has arrived in Dell's UltraSharp 52 Thunderbolt Hub Monitor, which was announced at CES 2026. Despite having released a productivity-focused 4K QD-OLED of the same size in 2025 that regularly sold for well under $1,000, its new one costs more mainly due to having greater color aâ€¦

items.title: Vibe Bot is an AI agent that sits on your desk
items.summary: Smart whiteboard manufacturer Vibe is expanding further into hybrid work hardware with the Vibe Bot, a physical AI device that can serve as a voice assistant, a smart webcam, and an AI note-taker, designed for office desks and meeting rooms. Despite the name, Vibe Bot is definitely not a robot. In â€¦

items.summary: Razer is announcing a new Wolverine V3 BT controller at CES 2026 that's designed for TVs. It's the world's first gamepad to use ultra-low latency Bluetooth, allowing it a sub-3ms response time, and the first accessory to launch under LG's "Designed for LG Gaming Portal" program. But since it's beenâ€¦

items.summary: Ring is introducing a host of new security devices and technologies, including a new line of security cameras and a mobile trailer equipped with a camera that can cover large areas. While these devices were developed mostly for enterprise-level security, they can be purchased and used for home and â€¦

items.title: Razer made a concept gaming chair with speakers, RGB lights, and rumble
items.summary: Razer is combining its various gaming chair add-ons of speakers, RGB lighting, and force feedback into one proof of concept: Project Madison. It features dual RGB light strips in the top corners, a pair of THX-certified speakers with spatial audio (which can act as the rear channels in 5.1 or 7.1 aâ€¦

items.title: AMD announces the new Ryzen 7 9850X3D gaming CPU
items.summary: AMD today announced the Ryzen 7 9850X3D at CES 2026. This is a higher binned version of the company's popular 9800X3D gaming CPU, and can hit higher clock speeds. This part has been rumored heavily in the past several weeks, and appeared in several leaks, including ones from Dell and AMD itself. Thâ€¦

items.title: Kilmarnock 'have faith' McCann can keep them up
items.summary: Kilmarnock "have complete faith" new manager Neil McCann and assistant Billy Dodds can keep the Ayrshire club in the Scottish Premiership.

items.title: Kilmarnock 'have faith' McCann can keep them up
items.summary: Kilmarnock "have complete faith" new manager Neil McCann and assistant Billy Dodds can keep the Ayrshire club in the Scottish Premiership.

items.title: West Bromwich Albion sack head coach Mason
items.summary: Ryan Mason is sacked as head coach of West Bromwich Albion following Monday's Championship defeat by Leicester City.

items.title: Redmi Note 15 5G and Redmi Pad 2 Pro now available in India
items.summary: After making its global debut in December 2025, the Redmi Note 15 5G has now made its way to India. It is available for purchase in the country alongside the Redmi Pad 2 Pro. In India, the Redmi Note 15 5G will go on sale starting January 9. It will be sold in Black, Mist Purple, and Glacier Blue câ€¦

items.title: Lego unveils new smart brick with embedded computer inside â€” Smart Play platform features tiny 4.1mm custom ASIC with sensors, RGB LEDs, and even a tiny speaker
items.summary: LEGO has pulled the wraps off a familiar-looking product that behaves like a small computer. The new Smart Play platform centers on a standard 2x4 LEGO brick that packs processing, sensing, audio, wireless networking, and charging into a familiar form factor.

items.title: Anycubic Announces 'First Print Guarantee' for burgeoning 3D printers â€” limited time promo includes comprehensive setup review if your first print doesn't go to plan
items.summary: Snapmaker rides its U1 tool changer to the big leagues.

items.title: Rashford may have route back to Man Utd - Tuesday's gossip
items.summary: Ruben Amorim sacking might offer Marcus Rashford way back to Manchester United, trio may stay at Old Trafford after head coach's exit, Juventus keen on Federico Chiesa return.

items.title: 'One of the greatest disgraces in modern European football' - Smith and Sutton on Rosenior appointment
items.summary: Monday Night Club's Chris Sutton and Rory Smith give their views on Liam Rosenior's appointment as Chelsea head coach and the consequences for Strasbourg, with Rory Smith describing Chelsea's use of their multi-club ownership model to "summon" Rosenior as "unfair."

items.title: Samsung showcases foldable display with no visible crease at CES 2026
items.summary: With CES 2026 underway, brands are unveiling their latest tech. Samsung has announced several products, including a massive 130-inch Micro RGB TV. It reportedly also showcased a new creaseless foldable display at the event. Tipster Ice Universe has shared images of a new foldable display that was sâ€¦

items.title: Nvidia CEO confirms Vera Rubin NVL72 is now in production â€” Jensen Huang uses CES keynote to announce the milestone
items.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang announced during his keynote speech at CES that Vera Rubin NVL72 is now officially in production. The new datacenter AI platform offers up to 5x the performance of Blackwell counterparts.

items.summary: vivo has launched two new affordable 5G phones in China, namely the Y50s 5G and the Y50e 5G. Both models feature an identical design and share most of their specifications. The phones are now available for purchase in the Chinese market. The vivo Y50s 5G and Y50e 5G are powered by the MediaTek Dimeâ€¦

items.summary: England's meek performance on day three of the fifth Ashes Test felt like the end of an era, says Stephan Shemilt.

items.title: Battle of the Sexes 'brought eyes on tennis'
items.summary: Women's world number one Aryna Sabalenka defends the 'Battle of the Sexes' match against Nick Kyrgios after opening her season with a crushing win in Brisbane.

items.title: Realme 16 Pro+ in for review
items.summary: Realme kicks off 2026 in style with the 16 Pro+. The phone has a solid specs sheet, but what you'll notice first is just how impressive it looks. But before we get to either topic, let's unbox it. The phone ships with a full box - you get a USB-A to USB-C cable, a case, and an 80W SuperVOOC chargerâ€¦

items.title: Norrie wins and Kyrgios' return ends in defeat
items.summary: Nick Kyrgios' first ATP Tour match since March ends in a first-round defeat at the Brisbane International, as Britain's Cameron Norrie books his place in the second round with a hard-fought win.

items.title: Smith and Head score centuries as Australia punish England on day three
items.summary: Travis Head scores 163 and Steve Smith ends unbeaten on 129 as Australia close on 518-7 in their first innings, leading England by 134 runs at stumps on day three of the fifth and final Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: 'I hope he's here for a long time' â€“ Smith shows he's not done yet
items.summary: Steve Smith thwarts England again during the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney to leave only the great Sir Don Bradman ahead in terms of Ashes runs scored.

items.title: Here's when the vivo X200T is expected to launch and how much it will cost
items.summary: According to a new rumor, vivo will be launching the X200T in India in the last week of this month. The phone will have "aggressive pricing", starting around INR 50,000 to INR 55,000. That's lower than what a previous rumor claimed - INR 60,000. The vivo X200T will allegedly be offered in Stellar Bâ€¦

items.title: Smith and Head push England towards final Ashes loss
items.summary: Steve Smith's ruthless unbeaten century and Travis Headâ€™s majestic 163 on day three put Australia in total control of the fifth Ashes Test against England.

items.title: 'He's like a gladiator' - Smith reaches century as Australia build lead
items.summary: Australia captain Steve Smith leads from the front as he scores his 13th career Ashes century on his home ground to help his team to 449-7 in their first innings, giving them a 65-run lead against England on day three of the fifth Test in Sydney.

items.title: Realme 16 Pro+ is here with 200MP main cam and 7,000 mAh battery
items.summary: Realme 16 Pro+ is the first major release from the brand in 2026, and it brings an updated design with a clear focus on cameras. It's among the first Realme devices to sport the new LumaColor Image image processing technology, which aims to deliver more natural skin tones, improved color accuracy aâ€¦

items.title: From Aronimink to Zalatoris - an A-Z of golf in 2026
items.summary: It could be a struggle to match the tumultuous highs of last year but there is still plenty to look forward to in the coming 12 months, writes Iain Carter.

items.title: Nvidia introduces DLSS 4.5 and Multi Frame Generation 6X at CES 2026 â€” updated models can generate higher-quality upscaled frames and more of them, dynamically
items.summary: Nvidia might not be introducing new gaming GPUs at CES 2026, but version 4.5 of its DLSS upscaler and an upcoming MFG 6x mode promises better image quality and smoother performance.

items.title: RedMagic 11 Air seemingly runs Geekbench confirming its chipset and RAM amount
items.summary: Last month RedMagic confirmed that it's working on the 11 Air, the successor to the RedMagic 10 Air launched back in April. The RedMagic 11 Air uses the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, as confirmed by a Geekbench run of a device with the model number NX799J. This is most likely the RedMagic 11 Air. The proâ€¦

items.title: AMD touts Instinct MI430X, MI440X, and MI455X AI accelerators and Helios rack-scale AI architecture at CES â€” full MI400-series family fulfills a broad range of infrastructure and customer requirements
items.summary: AMD reveals additional details about its strategy for AI and HPC deployments this year with EPYC 'Venice' and 'Venice-X' CPUs as well as Instinct MI430X, MI440X, and MI455X accelerators.

items.title: Qualcomm announces Snapdragon X2 Plus for cheaper laptops
items.summary: Back in September, Qualcomm unveiled the Snapdragon X2 Elite and Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme chipsets for Windows on Arm laptops, and today it's introducing the cheaper option in the portfolio, the Snapdragon X2 Plus. This is the successor to the Snapdragon X Plus from September 2024. The Snapdragoâ€¦

items.title: Alienware brings OLED to its gaming laptops for the first time in years â€” anti-glare OLED display boasts 240Hz refresh rate and 0.2ms response time
items.summary: Alienware is bringing its 16-inch laptops up to speed with other high-end offerings, introducing a 240Hz OLED panel for the first time ever across its Area-51 and Aurora designs.

items.title: AMDâ€™s Ryzen 7 9850X3D promises 7% uplift over Ryzen 7 9800X3D â€“ AMD fights itself with â€˜new fastest gaming processorâ€™
items.summary: The long-rumored Ryzen 7 9850X3D is official, but AMDâ€™s own benchmarks paint an underwhelming picture for performance gains.

items.title: AMD's Ryzen AI 400 series includes the first Copilot+ desktop CPU â€” Team Red refreshes Zen 5 APUs and Strix Halo
items.summary: AMDâ€™s new Ryzen AI 400 â€˜Gorgon Pointâ€™ APUs are primarily driven by a clock speed bump, featuring similar silicon as the previous generation otherwise.

items.title: Boundaries, drops and no more reviews - England's morning to forget
items.summary: Expensive overs, dropped catches and lost reviews sees England have a morning session to forget against Australia on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: Keychron launches wireless Q Ultra keyboard series with up to 660 hours of battery life with 8K polling â€” thanks to ZMK firmware
items.summary: Keychron launches new Q Ultra keyboard series with up to 660 hours of battery life with an 8K wireless polling rate, thanks to open source ZMK firmware. Also announces high-end luxury keyboards made of rock.

items.title: Head finally out for 163 as Bethell gets first Ashes wicket
items.summary: England finally bring an end to Travis Head's innings as he's trapped lbw for 163 by Jacob Bethell as he picks up his first Ashes wicket, to leave Australia 288-4 in their first innings, trailing England by 96 runs on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: 'He's way ahead of the rest' - Head hits another stunning Ashes innings
items.summary: Watch the best shots of Travis Head's first innings as the Australian batter hits 163 off 166 balls, his third score of 100 or higher in the series, to put his side in control of the fifth and final Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: Gemini on Google TV is getting smarter
items.summary: Today at CES, Google has announced a few improvements coming to Gemini for Google TV. These features will arrive on "select TCL devices" first, and other Google TV devices "over the coming months". First, you'll be able to use Gemini to search through your Google Photos library for specific people â€¦

items.title: 'What a miss!' - Jacks drops simple chance as Head survives
items.summary: Will Jacks drops a simple catch on the boundary as England miss the chance to remove Travis Head, who remains unbeaten on 121 on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: Amazon's Alexa+ now has a home on the web
items.summary: Amazon's AI-powered Alexa+ chatbot now has its very own home on the web at alexa.com. You just need to sign in with your Amazon account to use it, provided you are part of the Alexa+ Early Access. Amazon says over 10 million people are already using Alexa+, the AI-infused evolution of the Alexa assâ€¦

items.title: Asus ROG G1000 gaming PC is covered in holograms â€” this RTX 5090, 9950X3D rig is 'built to be seen'
items.summary: There are also new gaming laptops.

items.title: Acer announces new Predator-series wireless gaming headset and mouse  â€” Galea 570 wireless headset and 8K Predator Cestus 530 gaming mouse due in first quarter
items.summary: Acer announced the Predator Galea 570 wireless gaming headset and the Predator Cestus 530 wireless gaming mouse alongside its new gaming laptops at CES 2026.

items.title: Acer brings trio of Predator and Nitro gaming monitors to CES â€” 1,000 Hz dual-mode, 5K 165 Hz, and 360Hz WQHD QD-OLED
items.summary: Acer has three new gaming monitors for CES 2026, including a 27-incher that can do 1,000 Hz at 720p.

items.title: MSIâ€™s newest 16-inch Raider and Stealth gaming laptops debut â€” Panther Lake options, OLED panels, and familiar RTX 50 GPUs
items.summary: MSI is updating the design languages for its Stealth and Raider laptops, with the former going for a more â€œprofessionalâ€ look.

items.title: Acer updates Predator, Nitro gaming laptops at CES 2026 â€“ Panther Lake finds its way across the lineup
items.summary: Acer's new Predator and Nitro gaming laptops are getting bumps up to Intel's 3rd Gen Core Ultra Series processors, but we don't know how much they'll cost.

items.title: HPâ€™s HyperX Omen 34 gaming monitor delivers V-Stripe QD-OLED tech â€” HyperX-branded screen boasts 360 Hz QHD panel, KVM, and 100-watt USB-C PD
items.summary: HP is ringing in the new year at CES 2026 with the HyperX Omen 34 gaming monitor, which boasts next-generation V-Stripe QD-OLED technology and a wealth of gaming features

items.title: Acer refreshes Swift laptops with Panther Lake â€” claims 'world's largest haptic touchpad' on Swift 16 AI
items.summary: Acer is refreshing its Swift, Swift Edge, and Swift Go laptops at CES 2026 with the latest Intel processors, but we still don't know how much they'll cost.

items.title: HP puts HyperX name on Omen gaming laptops â€” new systems get Intel and AMD's latest processors
items.summary: HP has put HyperX front and center as its gaming system brand, combining it with Omen as it updates systems to Panther Lake and Gorgon Point.

items.title: MSIâ€™s Prestige ultra-thin laptops and convertibles embrace Panther Lake â€“ up to Core Ultra X9 with standard OLED panels
items.summary: MSI includes Intel Panther Lake processors across the board (up to a Core Ultra X9) with its new Prestige family.

items.title: Dell brings back XPS laptops â€” ditches the capacitive touch bar, adds 1Hz display option, and upgrades 14 and 16-inch models
items.summary: Dell is bringing back the XPS laptop brand, and has redesigned the system to remove the controversial capacitive function row. This year's XPS 14 and 16 are getting Intel's Panther Lake processors, and a new 13-incher is coming later this year.

items.title: Intel doubles down on gaming with Panther Lake, claims 76% faster gaming performance â€” new X-series chips can match discrete RTX 4050
items.summary: Intel finally unveiled the specs and speeds of its Panther Lake processors at CES, with the headline addition being a new lineup of X-series chips that sport a bigger GPU.

items.summary: During his CES 2026 keynote, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang introduced Vera Rubin NVL72, the companyâ€™s next-generation rack-scale AI accelerator. Rubin promises 5x greater inference performance and 10x lower cost per token than the last-gen Grace Blackwell NVL72 rack.
